posts.post_title: N162 & N172 Jack Glasscock + Rookie Scorecard
posts.post_content:
Over the last 2 years I have been working to complete a Jack Glasscock set and now that its complete I'm looking for a good home for it. All cards received numerical grades prior to cracking for archival framing.
